argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zrhval.l | |- L = ( ZRHom ` R ) |

| 3 |  | zrhval2.1 | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_zrhval | |- L = U. ( ZZring RingHom R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. .1. ) ) = ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. .1. ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5, 3 | #P_mulgrhm2 | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ZZring RingHom R ) = { ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. .1. ) ) } ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_unieqd | |- ( R e. Ring -> U. ( ZZring RingHom R ) = U. { ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. .1. ) ) } ) |
| 8 |  | #P_zex | |- ZZ e. _V |
| 9 | 8 | #P_mptex | |- ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. .1. ) ) e. _V |
| 10 | 9 | #P_unisn | |- U. { ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. .1. ) ) } = ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. .1. ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( R e. Ring -> U. ( ZZring RingHom R ) = ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. .1. ) ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( R e. Ring -> L = ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. .1. ) ) ) |
